infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Ask Devi needs access to your photo library to allow you to select and share images in your conversations with the AI assistant.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Ask Devi needs access to your camera to allow you to take photos and share them in your conversations with the AI assistant.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Ask Devi may need access to your microphone for voice input and audio features when interacting with the AI assistant.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Ask Devi may use your location to provide location-based suggestions and improve your AI assistant experience.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Ask Devi needs permission to save images to your photo library when you choose to download or save content from your conversations.
